00050                 public Media RowGetterDelegate(int i)
00051                 {
00052                         if (i < Playlist.Instance.Count)
00053                                 return Playlist.Instance[i];
00054                         else
00055                                 return null;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 public void SortDelegate(BrightIdeasSoftware.OLVColumn column, SortOrder order)
00059                 {
00060                         List<Media> mediaList = new List<Media>();
00061 
00062                         string orderStr;
00063 
00064                         switch (order)
00065                         {
00066                                 case SortOrder.Ascending:
00067                                 case SortOrder.None:
00068                                         orderStr = "ASC";
00069                                         break;
00070                                 case SortOrder.Descending:
00071                                 default:
00072                                         orderStr = "DESC";
00073                                         break;
00074                         }
00075 
00076 
00077                         if (mediaListBackup == null)
00078                         {
00079                                 ObjectComparer<Media> comparer;
00080                                 if (column.AspectName == "TrackNr")
00081                                 {
00082                                         comparer = new ObjectComparer<Media>("Artist ASC, Album ASC, TrackNr ASC", true);
00083                                 }
00084                                 else
00085                                 {
00086                                         comparer = new ObjectComparer<Media>(column.AspectName + " " + orderStr, true);
00087                                 }
00088 
00089                                 Playlist.Instance.Sort(comparer);
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                         {
00093                                 switch (order)
00094                                 {
00095                                         case SortOrder.Ascending:
00096                                         case SortOrder.None:
00097                                                 StandardQuery.sort.order = Query.SortOrder.Ascending;
00098                                                 break;
00099                                         case SortOrder.Descending:
00100                                         default:
00101                                                 StandardQuery.sort.order = Query.SortOrder.Descending;
00102                                                 break;
00103                                 }
00104 
00105                                 if (column.AspectName == "TrackNr")
00106                                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Smart;
00107                                 else if (column.AspectName == "Artist")
00108                                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Artist;
00109                                 else if (column.AspectName == "Title")
00110                                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Title;
00111                                 else if (column.AspectName == "Album")
00112                                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Album;
00113 
00114                                 queryPlaylist();
00115                         }
00116 
00117                         lvPlaylist.BuildList();
00118                 }
00119

00136                 private void gui_krypton_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00137                 {
00138                         gui_SplashScreen.SetStatus("Populating playlist ...");
00139                         lvPlaylist.RowGetter = RowGetterDelegate;
00140                         lvPlaylist.CustomSorter = SortDelegate;
00141 
00142                         // Install aspect getters to optimize performance
00143                         columnTrackNr.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00144                         {
00145                                 if (x == null) return 0;
00146                                 return ((Media)x).TrackNr;
00147                         };
00148                         columnArtist.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00149                         {
00150                                 if (x == null) return "";
00151                                 return ((Media)x).Artist;
00152                         };
00153                         columnTitle.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00154                         {
00155                                 if (x == null) return "";
00156                                 return ((Media)x).Title;
00157                         };
00158                         columnAlbum.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00159                         {
00160                                 if (x == null) return "";
00161                                 return ((Media)x).Album;
00162                         };
00163                         columnRating.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00164                         {
00165                                 if (x == null) return 0;
00166                                 return ((Media)x).Rating;
00167                         };
00168                         columnLength.AspectGetter = delegate(object x)
00169                         {
00170                                 if (x == null) return -1;
00171                                 return ((Media)x).Length;
00172                         };
00173                         columnTrackNr.AspectToStringConverter = delegate(object aspect)
00174                         {
00175                                 int i = Convert.ToInt32(aspect);
00176                                 if (i == 0) return "";
00177                                 else return i.ToString();
00178                         };
00179                         columnLength.AspectToStringConverter = delegate(object aspect)
00180                         {
00181                                 string lenStr;
00182                                 int length = ((int)aspect);
00183 
00184                                 if (length == -1)
00185                                 {
00186                                         lenStr = "";
00187                                 }
00188                                 else
00189                                 {
00190                                         lenStr = String.Format("{0:00}:{1:00}", length / 1000 / 60, (length / 1000) % 60);
00191                                 }
00192 
00193                                 return lenStr;
00194                         };
00195                         columnRating.Renderer = new BrightIdeasSoftware.MultiImageRenderer(Properties.Resources.star, 5, 0, 5);
00196 
00197                         columnTrackNr.ImageGetter = delegate(object rowObject)
00198                         {
00199                                 if (rowObject == null) return 4;
00200 
00201                                 Media m = (Media)rowObject;
00202                                 Media currentMedia = ((Media)Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor]);
00203 
00204                                 if (currentMedia == null) return 4;
00205 
00206                                 if (m.uri == currentMedia.uri)
00207                                         return 1;
00208                                 else
00209                                         return 4;
00210                         };
00211 
00212                         StandardQuery = new Query(new List<Query.Match>());
00213                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Smart;
00214                         StandardQuery.sort.order = Query.SortOrder.Ascending;
00215 
00216                         Media[] results = MediaDB.Instance.mediaList.ToArray();
00217                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00218                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(results);
00219                         updatePlaylist();
00220 
00221                         setViewmode(Viewmode.Playlist);
00222 
00223                         /* Populate Media Library TreeView */
00224                         tnMediaLibrary = new TreeNode("Media Library", 0, 0);
00225                         tnMediaLibrary.Tag = "media-lib";
00226 
00227                         tnPlaylists = new TreeNode("My Playlists", 1, 1);
00228                         tnSmartlists = new TreeNode("My Smartlists", 2, 2);
00229                         tnPeer2Peer = new TreeNode("My Network", 4, 4);
00230                         tnAudioCDs = new TreeNode("Audio CD", 3, 3);
00231 
00232                         refreshPlayAndSmartlists();
00233 
00234                         this.tvMediaLibrary.Nodes.AddRange(new System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode[] { tnMediaLibrary, tnPlaylists, tnSmartlists, tnPeer2Peer, tnAudioCDs });
00235                         m_DelegateAddMedia = new DelegateAddMedia(this.addMediaToPlaylist);
00236 
00237                         timer1.Enabled = true;
00238                         gui_SplashScreen.CloseForm();
00239                         onMediaChanged();
00240                 }
00241 
00242                 public void refreshPlayAndSmartlists()
00243                 {
00244                         tnPlaylists.Nodes.Clear();
00245                         foreach (PlaylistFile p in MediaDB.Instance.playlists)
00246                         {
00247                                 TreeNode tmp = new TreeNode(p.name, 1, 1);
00248                                 tmp.Tag = p.filename;
00249                                 tnPlaylists.Nodes.Add(tmp);
00250                         }
00251 
00252                         tnSmartlists.Nodes.Clear();
00253                         foreach (Query q in MediaDB.Instance.smartlists.Items)
00254                         {
00255                                 TreeNode tmp = new TreeNode(q.name, 2, 2);
00256                                 tmp.Tag = q;
00257                                 tnSmartlists.Nodes.Add(tmp);
00258                         }
00259 
00260                         tnAudioCDs.Nodes.Clear();
00261                         DriveInfo[] drives = DriveInfo.GetDrives();
00262                         foreach (DriveInfo drive in drives)
00263                         {
00264                                 if (drive.DriveType == DriveType.CDRom)
00265                                 {
00266                                         TreeNode tmp = new TreeNode("Audio CD (" + drive.Name + ")", 3, 3);
00267                                         tmp.Tag = drive.Name;
00268                                         tnAudioCDs.Nodes.Add(tmp);
00269                                 }
00270                         }
00271                 }

00283                 public void setViewmode(Viewmode vm)
00284                 {
00285                         switch (vm)
00286                         {
00287                                 case Viewmode.Playlist:
00288                                         lvPlaylist.Show();
00289                                         videoCanvas.Hide();
00290                                         drawingCanvas.Hide();
00291                                         backButton.Hide();
00292                                         break;
00293                                 case Viewmode.Picture:
00294                                         drawingCanvas.Show();
00295                                         videoCanvas.Hide();
00296                                         lvPlaylist.Hide();
00297                                         backButton.Show();
00298                                         break;
00299                                 case Viewmode.Video:
00300                                         videoCanvas.Show();
00301                                         drawingCanvas.Hide();
00302                                         lvPlaylist.Hide();
00303                                         backButton.Show();
00304                                         break;
00305                         }
00306                 }

00308                 private void btnPlay_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00309                 {
00310                         if (Player.Instance.isPlaying) Player.Instance.mediaChangeIntended = true;
00311                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00312 
00313                         try
00314                         {
00315                                 Player.Instance.stop();
00316                                 Player.Instance.open(ref tmp);
00317                                 Player.Instance.play();
00318                                 updatePlaylist();
00319                         }
00320                         catch (WebException)
00321                         {
00322                                 MessageBox.Show("The server has locked the file. Please try again later.", "WebException", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00323                         }
00324                         catch (InvalidOperationException)
00325                         {
00326                                 btnNext_Click(sender, e);
00327                         }
00328                 }

00353                 private void btnOpen_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00354                 {
00355                         OpenFileDialog ofd = new OpenFileDialog();
00356                         ofd.CheckFileExists = true;
00357                         ofd.CheckPathExists = true;
00358                         ofd.DereferenceLinks = true;
00359                         ofd.RestoreDirectory = true;
00360                         ofd.Filter = "Musikdateien (*.mp3, *.ogg, *.flac, *.wma)|*.mp3;*.ogg;*.flac; *.wma|Alle Dateien (*.*)|*.*";
00361 
00362                         if (ofd.ShowDialog() == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK)
00363                         {
00364                                 Media media = new Media(new Uri(System.IO.Path.GetFullPath(ofd.FileName)));
00365                                 if (mediaListBackup != null)
00366                                 {
00367                                         mediaListBackup.Add(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(media));
00368                                 }
00369                                 else
00370                                 {
00371                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(media);
00372                                 }
00373                                 this.updatePlaylist();
00374                         }
00375                 }

00392                 private void tsmiLoadPlaylist_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00393                 {
00394                         OpenFileDialog ofd = new OpenFileDialog();
00395                         ofd.InitialDirectory = Program.MusicPath + @"\Playlists";
00396                         ofd.CheckFileExists = true;
00397                         ofd.CheckPathExists = true;
00398                         ofd.DereferenceLinks = true;
00399                         ofd.RestoreDirectory = true;
00400                         ofd.Filter = "Playlist (*.m3u)|*.m3u|Alle Dateien (*.*)|*.*";
00401 
00402                         if (!Directory.Exists(ofd.InitialDirectory)) Directory.CreateDirectory(ofd.InitialDirectory);
00403 
00404                         if (ofd.ShowDialog() == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK)
00405                         {
00406                                 Playlist.Instance.loadFromFile(new Uri(ofd.FileName), false);
00407                                 mediaListBackup = null;
00408                                 tbxSearch.Text = "";
00409                                 this.updatePlaylist();
00410                         }
00411                 }

00413                 private void savePlaylistToFileToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00414                 {
00415                         SaveFileDialog sfd = new SaveFileDialog();
00416                         sfd.InitialDirectory = Program.MusicPath + @"\Playlists";
00417                         sfd.DereferenceLinks = true;
00418                         sfd.RestoreDirectory = true;
00419                         sfd.Filter = "Playlist (*.m3u)|*.m3u|Alle Dateien (*.*)|*.*";
00420                         sfd.OverwritePrompt = true;
00421                         sfd.AddExtension = true;
00422                         sfd.DefaultExt = "m3u";
00423 
00424                         if (!Directory.Exists(sfd.InitialDirectory)) Directory.CreateDirectory(sfd.InitialDirectory);
00425 
00426                         if (sfd.ShowDialog() == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK)
00427                         {
00428                                 Playlist.Instance.saveAsFile(sfd.FileName);
00429                         }
00430                 }

00432                 private void updatePlaylist()
00433                 {
00434                         try
00435                         {
00436                                 lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize = Playlist.Instance.Count;
00437                         }
00438                         catch (ArgumentOutOfRangeException)
00439                         {
00440                                 if (lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize > 0) lvPlaylist.Items[0].EnsureVisible();
00441                                 lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize = Playlist.Instance.Count;
00442                         }
00443 
00444                         if (Playlist.Instance.Cursor >= 0 && Playlist.Instance.Cursor < lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize)
00445                                 lvPlaylist.Items[Playlist.Instance.Cursor].EnsureVisible();
00446 
00447                         lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00448                         queryPlaylist();
00449                 }

00472                 private void timer1_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00473                 {
00474                         Media media = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00475 
00476                         try
00477                         {
00478                                 Player.Instance.tick();
00479                         }
00480                         catch (InvalidOperationException)
00481                         {
00482                                 Playlist.Instance.Cursor = Playlist.Instance.next();
00483                                 btnPlay_Click(sender, e);
00484                         }
00485 
00486                         //Check wenn id3-tag gendert wurde, wird ein playlist refresh ausgelst
00487                         if (Playlist.Instance.id3tag_edited == true)
00488                         {
00489                                 updatePlaylist();
00490                                 Playlist.Instance.id3tag_edited = false;
00491                         }
00492 
00493                         if (media != null)
00494                         {
00495                                 /*foreach (ListViewItem item in lvPlaylist.Items)
00496                                         if (item.ImageIndex == 1 && Playlist.Instance.Cursor != item.Index) item.ImageIndex = -1;
00497 
00498                                 lvPlaylist.Items[Playlist.Instance.Cursor].ImageIndex = 1;*/
00499 
00500                                 if (media.Album == null && media.Artist == null && media.Title == null)
00501                                 {
00502                                         lblTitle.Text = media.uri.ToString();
00503                                         lblTitle2.Text = "";
00504                                 }
00505                                 else
00506                                 {
00507                                         lblTitle.Text = (string)((media.Title != null && media.Title != "") ? media.Title : "(Unknown)");
00508                                         lblTitle2.Text = "by "
00509                                                 + (string)((media.Artist != null && media.Artist != "") ? media.Artist : "(Unknown)")
00510                                                 + " from "
00511                                                 + (string)((media.Album != null && media.Album != "") ? media.Album : "(Unknown)");
00512                                 }
00513 
00514                                 if (media.Length != -1)
00515                                 {
00516                                         double position = (double)Player.Instance.Position / 1000;
00517                                         string posStr = String.Format("{0:00}:{1:00}", (int)Math.Floor(position / 60), ((int)position) % 60);
00518                                         string lenStr = String.Format("{0:00}:{1:00}", media.Length / 1000 / 60, (media.Length / 1000) % 60);
00519 
00520                                         lblPosition.Text = posStr + " of " + lenStr;
00521 
00522                                         if (!Player.Instance.Paused)
00523                                         {
00524                                                 tbPosition.Minimum = 0;
00525                                                 tbPosition.Maximum = (int)media.Length / 1000;
00526                                                 if (position != 0)
00527                                                         tbPosition.Value = (int)position;
00528                                                 tbPosition.Enabled = true;
00529                                         }
00530                                 }
00531                                 else
00532                                 {
00533                                         lblPosition.Text = "Streaming ...";
00534                                         tbPosition.Minimum = 0;
00535                                         tbPosition.Maximum = 1;
00536                                         tbPosition.Value = 0;
00537                                         tbPosition.Enabled = false;
00538                                 }
00539                         }
00540 
00541                         // Lautstrkennderung
00542                         if (!volumeScrolling)
00543                                 tbVolume.Value = (int)(Player.Instance.Volume * 100);
00544                 }
00545                 public void onMediaChanged()
00546                 {
00547                         pictureBox1.SizeMode = PictureBoxSizeMode.StretchImage;
00548                         Media m = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00549 
00550                         if (m != null && m.Cover != null)
00551                         {
00552                                 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(m.Cover);
00553                                 pictureBox1.Image = bmp;
00554                                 pictureBox1.Update();
00555                                 pictureBox1.Refresh();
00556                                 pbMiniCover.Image = bmp;
00557                                 pbMiniCover.Update();
00558                                 pbMiniCover.Refresh();
00559                         }
00560                         else
00561                         {
00562                                 pictureBox1.Image = null;
00563                                 pictureBox1.Update();
00564                                 pictureBox1.Refresh();
00565                                 pbMiniCover.Image = Properties.Resources.stdalbum;
00566                                 pbMiniCover.Update();
00567                                 pbMiniCover.Refresh();
00568                         }
00569                 }

00576                 private void tvMediaLibrary_DoubleClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00577                 {
00578                         TreeNode node = tvMediaLibrary.SelectedNode;
00579 
00580                         if (node != null && node.Tag != null)
00581                         {
00582                                 if (node == tnMediaLibrary)
00583                                 {
00584                                         MediaDB.Instance.rebuild();
00585                                         MediaDB.Instance.commit();
00586                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00587                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(MediaDB.Instance.mediaList.ToArray());
00588                                         mediaListBackup = null;
00589                                         tbxSearch.Text = "";
00590                                         updatePlaylist();
00591                                 }
00592                                 if (node.Parent == tnPlaylists)
00593                                 {
00594                                         try
00595                                         {
00596                                                 Playlist.Instance.loadFromFile((Uri)node.Tag, false);
00597                                                 mediaListBackup = null;
00598                                                 tbxSearch.Text = "";
00599                                         }
00600                                         catch (IOException)
00601                                         {
00602                                                 MessageBox.Show("One or more files from the Playlist are already in use", "Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00603                                         }
00604 
00605                                         updatePlaylist();
00606                                 }
00607                                 else if (node.Parent == tnSmartlists)
00608                                 {
00609                                         Query q = (Query)node.Tag;
00610 
00611                                         queryEngine qe = new queryEngine();
00612                                         qe.Data = MediaDB.Instance.mediaList.ToArray();
00613                                         Media[] result = qe.query(q);
00614 
00615                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00616                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(result);
00617 
00618                                         lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices.Clear();
00619                                         if (lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize > 0) lvPlaylist.Items[0].EnsureVisible();
00620                                         lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize = Playlist.Instance.Count;
00621                                         lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00622 
00623                                 }
00624                                 else if (node.Parent == tnAudioCDs)
00625                                 {
00626                                         string drive = (string)node.Tag;
00627                                         List<Media> tracks = new List<Media>();
00628 
00629                                         foreach (string file in Directory.GetFiles(drive, "*.cda", SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly))
00630                                         {
00631                                                 tracks.Add(new Media(new Uri(file)));
00632                                         }
00633 
00634                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00635                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(tracks.ToArray());
00636 
00637                                         lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices.Clear();
00638                                         if (lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize > 0) lvPlaylist.Items[0].EnsureVisible();
00639                                         lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize = Playlist.Instance.Count;
00640                                         lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00641                                 }
00642                                 else if (node.Parent == tnPeer2Peer)
00643                                 {
00644                                         P2PDB.Instance.Resolve((NetService)node.Tag);
00645                                 }
00646                         }
00647                 }

00664                 private void toolStripSplitButton1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00665                 {
00666                         // bugged - abfragen ob nur der button geklickt wird

00679                 private void gui_krypton_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)
00680                 {
00681                         Array a = (Array)e.Data.GetData(DataFormats.FileDrop);
00682 
00683                         if (a != null)
00684                         {
00685                                 for (int i = 0; i <= a.Length - 1; i++)
00686                                 {
00687                                         string s = a.GetValue(i).ToString();
00688                                         this.BeginInvoke(m_DelegateAddMedia, new Object[] { s });
00689 
00690                                         // Falls der Explorer ber unserer Form liegt ...
00691                                         this.Activate();
00692                                 }
00693                         }
00694                 }
00695 
00696                 private void gui_krypton_DragEnter(object sender, DragEventArgs e)
00697                 {
00698                         if (e.Data.GetDataPresent(DataFormats.FileDrop))
00699                                 e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Copy;
00700                         else
00701                                 e.Effect = DragDropEffects.None;
00702                 }

00704                 private void addMediaToPlaylist(String s)
00705                 {
00706                         string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
00707 
00708                         if (ext.ToLower().EndsWith(".m3u"))
00709                         {
00710                                 Media[] arr = Playlist.Instance.parseM3U(new Uri(s));
00711 
00712                                 if (mediaListBackup != null)
00713                                 {
00714                                         foreach (Media m in arr)
00715                                         {
00716                                                 mediaListBackup.Add(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(m));
00717                                         }
00718                                 }
00719                                 else
00720                                 {
00721                                         foreach (Media m in arr)
00722                                         {
00723                                                 Playlist.Instance.addMedia(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(m));
00724                                         }
00725                                 }
00726                         }
00727                         else
00728                         {
00729                                 Media media = new Media(new Uri(s));
00730 
00731                                 if (mediaListBackup != null)
00732                                 {
00733                                         mediaListBackup.Add(FileInfo.Instance.getInfo(media));
00734                                 }
00735                                 else
00736                                 {
00737                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(media);
00738                                 }
00739                         }
00740 
00741                         this.updatePlaylist();
00742                 }
00743

00745                 {
00746                         ListViewItem clickedItem = lvPlaylist.GetItemAt(5, e.Y);
00747                         if (clickedItem != null)
00748                         {
00749                                 clickedItem.Selected = true;
00750                                 clickedItem.Focused = true;
00751                         }
00752                 }

00754                 private void toolStripMenuItem1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00755                 {
00756                         gui_editTag guiEdit = new gui_editTag();
00757                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices[0]];
00758                         if (tmp.Type == Media.MediaType.Audio && tmp.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00759                         {
00760                                 try
00761                                 {
00762                                         guiEdit.readMedium(tmp);
00763                                         guiEdit.Show();
00764                                 }
00765                                 catch (IOException)
00766                                 {
00767                                         MessageBox.Show("File already in use", "Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00768                                 }
00769                         }
00770                         else
00771                                 MessageBox.Show("Editing is not possible via Network!\nYou can't edit/rate videos and pictures.", "Warning", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00772                 }
00773 
00774                 private void starsToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00775                 {
00776                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices[0]];
00777                         if (tmp.Type == Media.MediaType.Audio && tmp.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00778                         {
00779                                 int tmp_rating = tmp.Rating;
00780                                 try
00781                                 {
00782                                         Playlist.Instance.id3tag_edited = true;
00783                                         tmp.Rating = Convert.ToInt32((string)((ToolStripMenuItem)sender).Tag);
00784                                         tmp.commitToTag();
00785                                         lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00786                                 }
00787                                 catch (IOException)
00788                                 {
00789                                         tmp.Rating = tmp_rating;
00790                                         lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00791                                         MessageBox.Show("File already in use", "Error", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Stop);
00792                                 }
00793                         }
00794                         else
00795                                 if (tmp.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeHttp)
00796                                         MessageBox.Show("Editing is not possible via Network", "Warning", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00797                                 else if (tmp.Type != Media.MediaType.Audio)
00798                                         MessageBox.Show("Editing is only possible on audio files", "Warning", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00799                                 else
00800                                         MessageBox.Show("Editing is only possible.", "Warning", MessageBoxButtons.OK, MessageBoxIcon.Warning);
00801                 }

00804                 private void tbxSearch_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
00805                 {
00806                         queryPlaylist();
00807                 }
00808 
00809                 private void queryPlaylist()
00810                 {
00811                         if (tbxSearch.Text != "")
00812                         {
00813                                 if (mediaListBackup == null)
00814                                 {
00815                                         mediaListBackup = new List<Media>();
00816                                         mediaListBackup.AddRange((Media[])Playlist.Instance);
00817                                 }
00818 
00819                                 Query.Match match = new Query.Match();
00820                                 match.lhs = Query.MatchLHS.All;
00821                                 match.op = Query.MatchOp.Contains;
00822                                 match.rhs = tbxSearch.Text;
00823 
00824                                 List<Query.Match> matches = new List<Query.Match>();
00825                                 matches.Add(match);
00826 
00827                                 Query q = new Query(matches);
00828                                 q.conj = Query.Conjunction.And;
00829                                 q.sort.by = this.StandardQuery.sort.by;
00830                                 q.sort.order = this.StandardQuery.sort.order;
00831                                 q.numberOfResults = -1;
00832 
00833                                 queryEngine qe = new queryEngine();
00834                                 qe.Data = mediaListBackup.ToArray();
00835                                 Media[] result = qe.query(q);
00836 
00837                                 Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00838                                 Playlist.Instance.addMedia(result);
00839 
00840                                 lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices.Clear();
00841                                 if (lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize > 0) lvPlaylist.Items[0].EnsureVisible();
00842                                 lvPlaylist.VirtualListSize = Playlist.Instance.Count;
00843                                 lvPlaylist.Refresh();
00844                         }
00845                         else
00846                         {
00847                                 if (mediaListBackup != null)
00848                                 {
00849                                         StandardQuery.sort.by = Query.SortBy.Smart;
00850                                         StandardQuery.sort.order = Query.SortOrder.Ascending;
00851 
00852                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00853                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(mediaListBackup.ToArray());
00854                                         mediaListBackup = null;
00855                                         updatePlaylist();
00856                                 }
00857                         }
00858                 }
00859 
00860 
00861                 private void pictureBox1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00862                 {
00863                         Media tmp = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00864 
00865                         if (tmp.Cover != null && tmp != null)
00866                         {
00867                                 SaveFileDialog sfd = new SaveFileDialog();
00868                                 sfd.InitialDirectory = Program.MusicPath;
00869                                 sfd.DereferenceLinks = true;
00870                                 sfd.RestoreDirectory = true;
00871                                 sfd.Filter = "Bilder (*.jpg)|*.jpg|Alle Dateien (*.*)|*.*";
00872                                 sfd.OverwritePrompt = true;
00873                                 sfd.AddExtension = true;
00874                                 sfd.DefaultExt = "jpg";
00875 
00876                                 Media m = Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor];
00877                                 string filename = ((m.Artist != "") ? m.Artist : "(Unknown)")
00878                                                                         + " - " +
00879                                                                         ((m.Title != "") ? m.Title : "(Unknown)");
00880 
00881                                 if (!Directory.Exists(sfd.InitialDirectory)) Directory.CreateDirectory(sfd.InitialDirectory);
00882                                 sfd.FileName = filename;
00883                                 if (sfd.ShowDialog() == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.OK)
00884                                 {
00885                                         Stream ToStream = File.Create(sfd.FileName);
00886 
00887                                         Stream FromStream = ((Media)Playlist.Instance[Playlist.Instance.Cursor]).Cover;
00888                                         BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(FromStream);
00889                                         BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(ToStream);
00890                                         bw.Write(br.ReadBytes((int)FromStream.Length));
00891                                         bw.Flush();
00892                                         bw.Close();
00893                                         br.Close();
00894                                 }
00895                         }
00896                 }

00905                 List<NetService> servicesList = new List<NetService>();
00906                 public void p2p_DidRemoveService(NetServiceBrowser browser, NetService service, bool moreComing)
00907                 {
00908                         foreach (TreeNode item in tnPeer2Peer.Nodes)
00909                         {
00910                                 if (item.Text == service.Name)
00911                                         tnPeer2Peer.Nodes.Remove(item);
00912                         }
00913                 }
00914 
00915                 List<NetService> waitingAdd = new List<NetService>();
00916                 public void p2p_DidFindService(NetServiceBrowser browser, NetService service, bool moreComing)
00917                 {
00918                         if (service.Name != System.Environment.MachineName)
00919                         {
00920                                 for (int i = tnPeer2Peer.Nodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00921                                 {
00922                                         TreeNode node = tnPeer2Peer.Nodes[i];
00923 
00924                                         if (node.Text == service.Name)
00925                                                 node.Remove();
00926                                 }
00927 
00928                                 TreeNode newNode = new TreeNode(service.Name, 5, 5);
00929                                 newNode.Tag = service;
00930                                 tnPeer2Peer.Nodes.Add(newNode);
00931                         }
00932                 }
00933 
00934                 public void p2p_DidResolveService(NetService service)
00935                 {
00936                         foreach (IPEndPoint addr in service.Addresses)
00937                         {
00938                                 if (addr.AddressFamily == System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily.InterNetwork)
00939                                 {
00940                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00941                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(P2PDB.Instance.query(addr.Address, null));
00942                                         mediaListBackup = null;
00943                                         tbxSearch.Text = "";
00944                                         updatePlaylist();
00945                                 }
00946                         }
00947                 }
00948

00963                 private void deleteSelectedItemFromPlaylistToolStripMenuItem_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00964                 {
00965                         List<int> list = new List<int>();
00966 
00967                         if (mediaListBackup != null)
00968                         {
00969                                 if (MessageBox.Show("You can't delete an item from playlist while search is active.\nDo you want to cancel the search and switch to the complete view?", "Search active", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, MessageBoxIcon.Question) == DialogResult.Yes)
00970                                 {
00971                                         Playlist.Instance.clearPlaylist();
00972                                         Playlist.Instance.addMedia(mediaListBackup.ToArray());
00973                                         mediaListBackup = null;
00974                                         tbxSearch.Text = "";
00975                                         updatePlaylist();
00976                                 }
00977                                 else
00978                                 {
00979                                         return;
00980                                 }
00981                         }
00982 
00983                         foreach (int i in lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices)
00984                         {
00985                                 list.Add(i);
00986                         }
00987 
00988                         list.Sort();
00989                         list.Reverse();
00990 
00991                         foreach (int i in list)
00992                         {
00993                                 Playlist.Instance.removeItem(i);
00994                         }
00995 
00996                         lvPlaylist.SelectedIndices.Clear();
00997                         updatePlaylist();
00998                 }

01005                 private void activePeertoPeerNetworkToolStripMenuItem_CheckedChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
01006                 {
01007                         switch (activePeertoPeerNetworkToolStripMenuItem.Checked)
01008                         {
01009                                 case true:
01010                                         P2PDB.Instance.start();
01011                                         Program.serv.Start(Program.MusicPath);
01012                                         break;
01013                                 case false:
01014                                         Program.serv.Stop();
01015                                         P2PDB.Instance.stop();
01016                                         tnPeer2Peer.Nodes.Clear();
01017                                         break;
01018                         }
01019                 }

01021                 private void tsmiDeleteLibObj_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
01022                 {
01023                         TreeNode selnode = tvMediaLibrary.SelectedNode;
01024 
01025                         if (selnode != null)
01026                         {
01027                                 if (selnode.Parent == tnPlaylists)
01028                                 {
01029                                         Uri uri = (Uri)selnode.Tag;
01030                                         File.Delete(uri.LocalPath);
01031                                         tnPlaylists.Nodes.Remove(selnode);
01032                                 }
01033                                 else if (selnode.Parent == tnSmartlists)
01034                                 {
01035                                         Query q = (Query)selnode.Tag;
01036                                         MediaDB.Instance.smartlists.removeSmartlist(q);
01037                                         tnSmartlists.Nodes.Remove(selnode);
01038                                         MediaDB.Instance.commit();
01039                                 }
01040                         }
01041                 }

01054                 private void editToolStripMenuItem1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
01055                 {
01056                         TreeNode selnode = tvMediaLibrary.SelectedNode;
01057 
01058                         if (selnode != null)
01059                         {
01060                                 if (selnode.Parent == tnPlaylists)
01061                                 {
01062                                 }
01063                                 else if (selnode.Parent == tnSmartlists)
01064                                 {
01065                                         Query q = (Query)selnode.Tag;
01066                                         gui_Smartlist guismartlist = new gui_Smartlist();
01067                                         guismartlist.Show();
01068                                         guismartlist.loadSmartlist(q);
01069                                 }
01070                         }
01071                 }

01073                 private void contextMenuStrip2_Opening(object sender, CancelEventArgs e)
01074                 {
01075                         TreeNode node = tvMediaLibrary.SelectedNode;
01076 
01077                         if (node != null && node.Tag != null)
01078                         {
01079                                 if (node.Parent == tnPlaylists)
01080                                 {
01081                                         editToolStripMenuItem1.Enabled = false;
01082                                         tsmiDeleteLibObj.Enabled = true;
01083                                 }
01084                                 else if (node.Parent == tnSmartlists)
01085                                 {
01086                                         editToolStripMenuItem1.Enabled = true;
01087                                         tsmiDeleteLibObj.Enabled = true;
01088                                 }
01089                                 else
01090                                 {
01091                                         editToolStripMenuItem1.Enabled = false;
01092                                         tsmiDeleteLibObj.Enabled = false;
01093                                 }
01094                         }
01095                 }
